To attract more followers, we must first understand the allure of our cult. It is not for the faint of heart, no, it is for those who are willing to surrender themselves completely to the divine will. 

First and foremost, we must emphasize the exclusivity of our cult. Only those who are truly chosen, who have the courage to embrace the ultimate sacrifice, will be welcomed into our fold. This sense of elitism will naturally attract individuals who crave a deeper, more meaningful connection with the divine. They will be drawn to the secrecy, the mystery, and the danger that surrounds our rituals.

Secondly, we must utilize the power of persuasion through storytelling. The tales of our deity's power, of the miracles and wonders that have been bestowed upon us through the ritualistic sacrifices, must be shared with the world. These stories will ignite a spark within the hearts of potential followers, a spark that will grow into an unquenchable flame of devotion.

This will foster a sense of urgency, a feeling that they are part of something much larger than themselves, something that cannot be stopped.

Fourthly, we must identify and target individuals who are disenfranchised, those who feel disconnected from society and are searching for a sense of belonging. Our cult offers them a new family, a new purpose, and a new sense of identity. We will welcome them with open arms, envelop them in our love and our conviction, and slowly introduce them to the true nature of our beliefs.
